PageTitle: enable(Global management service plane defense view)
FuncDef:
The enable command enables global management and service plane protection.
The undo enable command disables global management and service plane protection.
By default, global management and service plane protection is disabled.
ParentView: Global management service plane defense view
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To help the device defend against attacks or unauthorized logins initiated by sending protocol packets, management and service plane protection is used to prevent packets of a specified protocol or all protocols from being sent to the CPU. Using management and service plane protection improves device security and reliability and ensures normal network operation.
A global policy takes effect on an entire Router. It simplifies configuration comparing with the method involving configuration on each interface of the entire Router.
The enable command can be run to apply a configured global policy to an entire Router.
Configuration Impact
After the enable command is run, the configured global policy will take effect.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
